00002 /// @file         CTreeGraphModel.h

00004 /// @author       Bob Buehler, Matt Dissinger, Kyle Owen

00006 /// @compiler     Windows: MinGW / Linux: GNU G++
00007 ///
00008 /// @project      GNAT
00009 ///
00010 /// @description  This file contains the declaration of the CTreeGraphModel
00011 ///               class which is a wrapper for the CTreeGraph class.  It is
00012 ///               designed to allow for notification of data modification by
00013 ///               requiring that all data modification be done through this
00014 ///               class.
00015 ///
00016 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00017 #ifndef _CTREEGRAPHMODEL_H_
00018 #define _CTREEGRAPHMODEL_H_
00019 
00020 #include "../CTreeGraph.h"
00021 #include "../../CStyleToolkit.h"
00022 #include <QObject>
00023 #include <QRect>
00024 #include <QList>
00025 
00026 typedef QPair<const STreeNode*, int> HistoryValue;
00027 typedef QList<HistoryValue> HistoryTable;
00028 
00029 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00030 /// CTreeGraphModel
00031 ///
00032 /// @description  The CTreeGraphModel class is a wrapper for the CTreeGraph.
00033 ///               It is created to allow QObjects to connect to and recieve
00034 ///               signals whenever any class has modified the underlying data.
00035 ///
00036 /// @limitations  The signals will only be emitted if the CTreeGraphModel is
00037 ///               used to edit. If it is bypassed and the CTreeGraph is
00038 ///               directly manipulated then there will be no signals sent.
00039 ///
00040 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00041 class CTreeGraphModel : public QObject
00042 {
00043     Q_OBJECT
00044 
00045 public:
00046     CTreeGraphModel( QObject *parent );
00047     ~CTreeGraphModel();
00048 
00049     void addChildNode( STreeNode *node, QPoint point );
00050     void addParentNode( STreeNode *node );
00051     void autoLayout();
00052     void autoName();
00053     void autoNumber( int min, int max );
00054 
00055     STreeNode * addChildNodeBasic( STreeNode *node );
00056 
00057     void createNewData();
00058     void deleteNode( STreeNode *node );
00059 
00060     void editHistoryPosition( QPoint point );
00061     void editNodeHistory( STreeNode *node, int history );
00062     void editNodeName( STreeNode *node, QString name );
00063     void editNodePosition( STreeNode *node, QPoint point );
00064     void editNodeQuiescentFlag( STreeNode *node, bool quiescent );
00065     void editNodeValue( STreeNode *node, qreal value );
00066     void editSubTreePosition( STreeNode *parent, QPoint point );
00067 
00068     int findMaxDepth( STreeNode *node );
00069     STreeNode * findNode( QPoint point );
00070     QRect getContainingRect() const;
00071     QPoint getHistoryPosition() const;
00072     HistoryTable getHistoryTable() const;
00073     STreeNode * getRootNode() const;
00074 
00075     void load( const QString &filename );
00076     void realignData();
00077     void rehook( STreeNode *parent, STreeNode *node );
00078     void save( const QString &filename ) const;
00079     void setRootNode( STreeNode *node );
00080 
00081     void unhook( STreeNode *node );
00082 
00083 private:
00084     void autoLayoutX( STreeNode *node, int &x );
00085     void autoLayoutY( STreeNode *node );
00086     void autoNumberHelper( int min, int max, STreeNode *node );
00087     STreeNode * findNodeHelper( STreeNode *node, QRect &rect );
00088     QRect getContainingRectHelper( STreeNode *parent ) const;
00089     void getHistoryTableHelper( const STreeNode *node,
00090          HistoryTable &table ) const;
00091     void shiftSubTree( STreeNode *parent, QPoint point );
00092     bool sortChildNodes( STreeNode *parent );
00093 
00094     //This variable is a pointer to the data set currently being used.
00095     CTreeGraph     *m_data;
00096     
00097     //This variable represents the upper left corner of the history table for
00098     //painting.
00099     QPoint          m_historyPosition;
00100 
00101     //This is a pointer to the style toolkit instance for quicker reference.
00102     CStyleToolkit  *m_style;
00103 
00104 signals:
00105     void quickEditOff();
00106     void repaint();
00107     void retrace();
00108 };
00109 
00110 #endif /*_CTREEGRAPHMODEL_H_*/
